resources.string:
This app queries the Duckduckgo public internet API to look up word definitions.

To get started, enter a search term (one or more than one word, spaces OK) in the box. If you use multiple words, they should be commonly found together for good results (e.g. "police officer"); press the button.
The app starts an asynchronous task (does not "freeze" during processing), submits a REST API request over HTTP, receives the json response, and parses the response using org.json.JSONObject.

The raw json is provided for educational purposes.

Thank you Duckduckgo for providing a public API.

Icon: Wikimedia Commons
Query sent to remote internet server
